songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
See, captain, the rain's falling in a A-I-M, the M.I.A

[Verse 1]
We were on a voyager, I was a passenger
The world thinks we're savage, but gave us baggage though
Where am I when I'm not posted up in Kansas?
Where am I when I'm not dropping bombs on Damascus?

[Chorus]
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus

[Verse 2]
The masses, us in Damascus, the masses have their faces
In the races to save their races tell your bases not to trace us
These seas are about to embrace us, on the land we get the tasers
And these waves might capsize us, and who the fuck is ISIS?

[Chorus]
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus

[Bridge]
Get the scissors, get the scissors, cut their rope on the bridges
Have to find a better way to reach brand new edges
Get the scissors, get the scissors, cut their rope on the bridges
Have to find a better way to reach brand new edges

[Chorus]
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
On Damascus, on Damascus
Dropping bombs on Damascus
songs.title: Damascus
